relation: I want to make a request for prayer for a good friend of mine D'Andre Manley whom I have been witnessing to since beginning of the year. He said he almost accepted Christ during the invitation but got so nervous at his church yesterday. Please pray that he accepts Christ and does not shrink back in fear.

Derrick had the interview today and it went really well. Please pray for Derrick to continue to move forward in the interview process, get this job and then continue to establish a very successful career in law enforcement. My heart feels very heavy today. Derrick and I both long that I stay at home to take care of the home, that we can have another child and that he is in a place to financial care for us. The fact that I know that Derrick is longing for this makes my heart ache so much more. Lord we know that you will grace our family with the opportunity to accomplish the same.
Prayers for my Aunt Gina to be cancer free and to have her strength restored.
Salvation for her unsaved family members, that they will surrender their lives to the Lord
Prayer for peace, joy, healing, a financial blessing, a renewed relationship with God and a return to good church home.
Stage 4 Lung Cancer, praying for God's healing power.
Justice for her husband's untimely death, strength and endurance to work and take care of her girls
Prayers for Pastor Penny to feel well again.
Prayer for traveling mercies and God's favor throughout the family trip.
Prayers to become closer with my faith and Jesus.. Pray for the desires of her heart to be granted when it comes to her husband, her family and her innermost yearnings.
Prayers for my cousin Travis to contact home and return home.
Spiritual wisdom, God's guidance and a miraculous healing
pageTitle: Prince Ministries List of People for which We are Praying Prince Ministries
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {369760=6/27/2013, 2793=  And pray in the Spirit on all occasions with all kinds of prayers and requests. With this in mind, be alert and always keep on praying for all the Lord’s people. – Ephesians 6:18, 363542=6/28/2013, 345763=7/1/2013, 357223=6/29/2013, 350880=6/30/2013}

M. Divine healing Orlando, FL Pat Spaulding Pray the message delivered today accomplishes God's purpose for each individual listening to the message. Pray for the word to prick the hearts of the unsaved and lead them to receive Christ. Pray the word minister to the individual needs of all those in attendance at Christian church services all over this nation. Pray those delivering the word receive validation from God that the message accomplished its intended purpose. all over this nation Pastors, preachers, teachers and speakers I am just heartbroken and sad, hurt and need strength to keep trying to do the best that I can and

Yeah - Now we pray for clearing the background check and receiving the job offer.  Dorothy & Dan R. Orlando, FL Continued spiritual growth Emmanuel   Respect Erica
